    • 构造器详细资料

      • ProjectCrossFunction

        private ProjectCrossFunction(int[] fields,
                             boolean[] isFromFirst,
                             R outTupleInstance)
        Instantiates and configures a ProjectCrossFunction. Creates output tuples by copying fields of crossed input tuples (or a full input object) into an output tuple.
        参数:
        fields - List of indexes fields that should be copied to the output tuple. If the full input object should be copied (for example in case of a non-tuple input) the index should be -1.
        isFromFirst - List of flags indicating whether the field should be copied from the first (true) or the second (false) input.
        outTupleInstance - An instance of an output tuple.

    • 方法详细资料

      • cross

        public R cross(T1 in1,
               T2 in2)
        从接口复制的说明: CrossFunction
        Cross UDF method. Called once per pair of elements in the Cartesian product of the inputs.
        指定者:
        cross 在接口中 CrossFunction<T1,T2,R extends Tuple>
        参数:
        in1 - Element from first input.
        in2 - Element from the second input.
        返回:
        The result element.

      • getFields

        protected int[] getFields()

      • getIsFromFirst

        protected boolean[] getIsFromFirst()
